ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] SoL
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It s the RAM - I have 384mb and I can still only see 20 of the 29 new models... seems to be running the same as before other than that. I have a PIII
ygData.messageBody:
--- "Nygaardr, FC3" <nygaardr@...>
wrote:
> Don't do it Jeff, heh. My friend here has a
> 1.5ghz, 256 megs of ram and
> 64mb Gforce2 card. He cant turn on all the new
> models and animations or EQ
> wont load. Kind of sucks, you would think a
> computer like that would be
> enough but its not if you want to see
> everything. Luckily I bought the same
> computer Jeff did hopefully it will work.
>
> Mu

It's the RAM - I have 384mb and I can still only
see 20 of the 29 new models... seems to be
running the same as before other than that. I
have a PIII 933mhz with a 60gb hard drive and am
using a Radeon 32mb video.

As far as lag is concerned - most of it stems
from your connection, I believe. I'm only on a
26.4K dial up (blech!!) and the game doesn't seem
any worse now for lag than it did before. /shrug


=====
